item.title: Introduction
item.description:
INTRO

Hi my name is GÃ¼lfem. Thats my [blog](hugo new posts/introduction.md) Ukraine’s President Volodymyr Zelensky has given details of an updated peace plan that offers Russia the potential withdrawal of Ukrainian troops from the east that Moscow has demanded.

PLANS

Giving details of the 20-point plan agreed by US and Ukrainian negotiators in Florida at the weekend, Zelensky said the Russians would respond on Wednesday once the Americans had spoken to them.
